name: The Pursue
description:
This only supports controllers (mainly XBox).

THIS IS A TWO-PLAYER GAME!

Players use left thumbstick to move.

Player 1 shoots with right shoulder button.

Player 2 shoots with left shoulder button.

Also, click the fullscreen button FOR WEBGL.
